Entries.default: Though crowd's continued ovation dims into a dull, distant hum. The apparition you saw before flares into being before you.

"Watcher! You do not embarrass yourself!"

The shimmering form slowly applauds, grinning with each ponderous clap.
"Toamowhai poured fury into your veins! He did right when he made you!"
"We will be crowning you Champion of the Hunt!"
"You again? What do you want?"
"You said 'we' - who else do you mean?"
"Do you reveal yourself to all the contenders, or is it just me?"
"That seems to imply there's a finite amount of killing in these games... that's a shame."
"I've heard enough."
"This place is a trap. It lured me as it has lured you!"
"Kazuwari thrives on the memories of countless warriors. Strongest among them are the Faces of the Hunt."
"The Crucible demands each Face select a favorite warrior. Some, like you, listen well. Most do not!"
"Agreed! These fools pray to Toamowhai! 'Let me live to see another season's Crucible!'"
"I will not stand between you and your prey. Go! Rend the weak until there is only victory - until there is only you."
"Slayer knows slaying, not caring for spirits. That is Watcher's work. So you must be slayer and Watcher both!"
The roar of the crowd returns to its thunderous volume as the apparition blurs into a soft, violet-red glow before vanishing entirely.
"Another, a woman in robes, also revealed herself to me."
"I met someone like you in the valley of the boars."

"The Seeking Face is but a spider trapped within its own web."

The apparition shrugs his massive shoulders.
"He is not impressive, rarely won easily. But never bested! He was the only Face to die of old age!"
"I was told you were a legendary Champion of the Crucible. Is that true?"
"When my season was in bloom, no hunter stood a chance against me! But I had an advantage - a painful advantage."
"Each misstep, each jab I should have seen coming, each life-ending failure! I learned from them, forged by battles waged before I drew breath!"
"The competition may be weaker than seasons past, but I see victory boiling in your veins!"
"Freedom! To live and breathe! To fuck and maim and kill!"
He roars in jubilant laughter.
"They fail to grasp - so long as there is spring, there is the hunt."
"And I am the strongest of the strongest!"
"Or I could just leave. This island hasn't trapped me yet."
The aumaua soul hisses like a cornered cat, lips curled back around burning teeth.
"And we would name you coward! You would wear your shame as a mantle for the rest of your seasons!"
"For I was awake to the memories of the last few seconds of every life I ever lived. And each one on this island!"
He chuckles quietly - a hateful, mocking sound.
